messages.message: I've been working on the password updating interface so testing my password reset a lot, and now my 2fa isn't working for some reason - I can get past login, but every time I try to enter my 2fa I get `Invalid two-factor token provided`, on local or dogfood. Any ideas why this would be?
Actually, a hard refresh just worked for me - I still wonder if it was something to do with my password changing
hrm, odd. Do you do any caching of sessions/user data in the front-end?

and i assume you’re doing this all in the same cluster? (locally?) Next time this happens, let me know and I can go poke around the DB for you to see if it’s actually updated. But if a hard reset fixes it, it’s likely a transient problem with caching.
Yup I was doing all the password resets and tying to log in locally. okay thanks!
i’ve had this problem for 6 months on dogfood. can confirm it’s there and if so can sit down with you to try to investigate @Heymian the week of the 20th.
